<S%H7200>"Consider<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> you to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> be <S%H2388>courageous<s%> and <S%H6213>act.<s%>"
